variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject identifier [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: CONTACT OCCASION [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: TOBA1
variable.description: Q1. Smoked at least 400 cigarettes in your lifetime [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA2
variable.description: Q2. Age when first started to smoke cigarettes regularly [that is every day] [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA3
variable.description: Q3. Do you now smoke cigarettes [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA4A
variable.description: Q4a. How long has it since you last smoked (months) [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA4B
variable.description: Q4b. How long has it since you last smoked (years) [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA5
variable.description: Q5. How many cigarettes do you smoke per day [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA6
variable.description: Q6. Do you smoke more frequently during the first few hours after awakening than during the rest of the day? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA7
variable.description: Q7. How soon after you wake up do you smoke your first cigarette? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA8
variable.description: Q8. Of all the cigarettes you smoke during the day, which one cigarette would you hate to give up most? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA9
variable.description: Q9. Do you find it difficult to refrain from smoking in places where it is forbidden, for example in church, the library, cinema, etc.? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA10
variable.description: Q10. Do you smoke if you are so ill that you are in bed most of the day? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA11
variable.description: Q11. On the average for the entire time you have smoked, how many cigarettes did you smoke usually per day? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA12
variable.description: Q12. Since you began smoking for how many years were you off cigarettes? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA13
variable.description: Q13. How deeply do you inhale the cigarette smoke- not at all, slightly, moderately, or deeply? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA14
variable.description: Q14. Have you ever used any other tobacco products regularly, that is cigar or cigarillos, pipes, chewing tobacco, or snuff/dip? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA15
variable.description: Q15. What is the number of years you have smoked cigars or cigarillos regularly? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA16
variable.description: Q16. Over the course of the entire time you smoked cigars or cigarillos, how many cigars or cigarillos per week have you typically smoked? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA17
variable.description: Q17. Do you currently smoke cigars or cigarillos? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA18
variable.description: Q18. What is the total number of years smoked a pipe regularly? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA19
variable.description: Q19. Over the course of the entire time you have smoked a pipe, how many pipefuls per week have you typically smoked? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA20
variable.description: Q20. Do you currently smoke a pipe? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA21
variable.description: Q21. What is the total number of years you have used chewing tobacco such as Redman, Beechnut or Levi Garret, regularly? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA22
variable.description: Q22. Over the course of the entire time you have used chewing tobacco, how many pouches per week have you typically chewed? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA23
variable.description: Q23. Do you currently use chewing tobacco? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA24
variable.description: Q24. What is the total number of years you have used snuff or dip, such as Skoal, Bandits or Copenhagen, regularly? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA25
variable.description: Q25. Over the course of the entire time you have used dip or snuff, how many cans per week have you typically used? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA26
variable.description: Q26. Do you currently use dip or snuff? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBA27
variable.description: Q27. During the past year about how many hours per week, on the average, were you in close contact with people where they were smoking? For example at work, your home, in a car, or other close quarters? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]
